amendment.description: To conduct a study regarding investments in intangible assets.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3210 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3210 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S12722-12723; text: CR S12723) To conduct a study regarding investments in intangible assets.
